VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v_hapus_sebagian` AS select `aa`.`Id` AS `id`,`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` AS `id_bukuinduk`,`aa`.`tgl_penghapusan` AS `tgl_penghapusan`,`aa`.`uraian` AS `uraian`,`aa`.`ket` AS `ket`,`aa`.`harga_awal` AS `harga_awal`,`aa`.`harga_hapus` AS `harga_hapus`,`aa`.`surat_no` AS `surat_no`,`aa`.`surat_tgl` AS `surat_tgl`,`aa`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`aa`.`uid` AS `uid`,`aa`.`idbi_awal` AS `idbi_awal`,`aa`.`harga_scrap` AS `harga_scrap`,`aa`.`tgl_perolehan` AS `tgl_perolehan`,`aa`.`nilai_buku` AS `nilai_buku`,`aa`.`nilai_susut` AS `nilai_susut`,`bb`.`a1` AS `a1`,`bb`.`a` AS `a`,`bb`.`b` AS `b`,`bb`.`c1` AS `c1`,`bb`.`c` AS `c`,`bb`.`d` AS `d`,`bb`.`e` AS `e`,`bb`.`e1` AS `e1`,`bb`.`f1` AS `f1`,`bb`.`f2` AS `f2`,`bb`.`f` AS `f`,`bb`.`g` AS `g`,`bb`.`h` AS `h`,`bb`.`i` AS `i`,`bb`.`j` AS `j`,`bb`.`noreg` AS `noreg`,`bb`.`thn_perolehan` AS `thn_perolehan`,`bb`.`kondisi` AS `kondisi`,`bb`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`bb`.`staset` AS `staset`,`bb`.`verifikasi` AS `verifikasi`,`cc`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang` from ((`penghapusan_sebagian` `aa` left join `buku_induk` `bb` on((`aa`.`id_bukuinduk` = `bb`.`id`))) left join `ref_barang` `cc` on(((`bb`.`f` = `cc`.`f`) and (`bb`.`g` = `cc`.`g`) and (`bb`.`h` = `cc`.`h`) and (`bb`.`i` = `cc`.`i`) and (`bb`.`j` = `cc`.`j`))))
